Yes,Icon is in production and it is magnificent. It is the no compromisevintage guitar. ButIcon does it in a totally iconic way, and with no vintage compromises. And almost everyAnderson option is available, as long as it does not alter the time-honoredlook. Another interesting aspect of Icon is that manyare ordered with Satin Finishes.
